subscription.description: The resource name of the subscription for which this event was generated. The format of the value is `projects/{project-id}/subscriptions/{subscription-id}`.

MessagePublishedData.title: Message Published Data
MessagePublishedData.description: The event data when a message is published to a topic.

data.description: The binary data in the message.

messageId.description: ID of this message, assigned by the server when the message is published. Guaranteed to be unique within the topic.

publishTime.description: The time at which the message was published, populated by the server when it receives the `Publish` call.

orderingKey.description: If non-empty, identifies related messages for which publish order should be respected.

PubsubMessage.title: Pubsub Message
PubsubMessage.description: A message published to a topic.
